summary: Defines a base class for relational graph convolutional networks (RGCN) using MXNet Gluon, handling the construction of input, hidden, and output graph convolution layers and implementing the forward pass over graph-structured data.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly build, train, and evaluate RGCN models for tasks such as node classification or link prediction on heterogeneous graphs within the MXNet ecosystem.
